Applications.Name: NotePad++
Applications.Description: Notepad++ is a free source code editor and Notepad replacement that supports several languages. Running in the MS Windows environment, its use is governed by GPL License.
Applications.LogonRequirement: Whether or not a user is logged on

Applications.Name: Wireshark x64
Applications.Description: Wireshark is the world's foremost network protocol analyzer. It lets you see what's happening on your network at a microscopic level. It is the de facto (and often de jure) standard across many industries and educational institutions.
Applications.LogonRequirement: Whether or not a user is logged on

Applications.Name: KeePass
Applications.Description: KeePass is an open source password manager. Passwords can be stored in highly-encrypted databases, which can be unlocked with one master password or key file.
Applications.LogonRequirement: Whether or not a user is logged on

Applications.Name: Putty
Applications.Description: PuTTY is a client program for the SSH, Telnet and Rlogin network protocols.  These protocols are all used to run a remote session on a computer, over a network. PuTTY implements the client end of that session: the end at which the session is displayed, rather than the end at which it runs.
Applications.LogonRequirement: Whether or not a user is logged on

Applications.Name: 7zip
Applications.Description: 7-Zip is a file archiver with a high compression ratio. You can use 7-Zip on any computer, including a computer in a commercial organization. You don't need to register or pay for 7-Zip.
Applications.LogonRequirement: Whether or not a user is logged on

Applications.Name: WinMerge
Applications.Description: WinMerge is an Open Source differencing and merging tool for Windows. WinMerge can compare both folders and files, presenting differences in a visual text format that is easy to understand and handle. WinMerge is highly useful for determining what has changed between project versions, and then merging changes between versions. WinMerge can be used as an external differencing/merging tool or as a standalone application.
Applications.LogonRequirement: Whether or not a user is logged on

Applications.Name: SCCM Client Center
Applications.Description: The tool is designed for IT Professionals to troubleshoot SMS/SCCM Client related Issues. The SCCM Client Center provides a quick and easy overview of client settings, including running services and SCCM settings in a good easy to use, user interface.
Applications.LogonRequirement: Whether or not a user is logged on

Applications.Name: HeidiSQL
Applications.Description: HeidiSQL is a useful and reliable tool designed for web developers using the popular MySQL server, Microsoft SQL databases and PostgreSQL. It enables you to browse and edit data, create and edit tables, views, procedures, triggers and scheduled events.
Applications.LogonRequirement: Whether or not a user is logged on

Applications.Name: Google Chrome
Applications.Description: Google Chrome is a browser that combines a minimal design with sophisticated technology to make the web faster, safer, and easier.
Applications.LogonRequirement: Whether or not a user is logged on
